attributes.action: Invalidate the EU Referendum, as the Brexit campaign wilfully misled voters.
attributes.additional_details:
The Brexit campaign used the following untrue/misleading points:

1. If Britain leaves the EU, the NHS would receive the funding that is currently given to the EU.

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/06/24/nigel-farage-350-million-pledge-to-fund-the-nhs-was-a-mistake/

2. If Britain leaves the EU, the number of immigrants would reduce. 

http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/evan-davis-newsnight-bbc-daniel-hannan-mep-eu-referendum-brexit_uk_576e2967e4b08d2c56393241
attributes.background: Key pledges made by the Brexit campaign have been disclosed as untrue, misleading or a mistake by leading members of that campaign. These admissions were made soon after referendum results were confirmed - the Brexit campaign had this information prior to votes being cast, and chose to withhold it.
